Pursuing commerce in 12th grade can be a turning point for the lives of many students. After the declaration of 12th class results, students get in a very confusing place due to the pressure of deciding which course to take and which college to go to. The Commerce stream can open up gateways to many fields for the students.

In this article, we will be discussing all the possibilities after 12th class in commerce stream including various courses and colleges.

List of Commerce Courses After 12th Grade

Here is the list of courses to take after you finish your 12th-grade commerce classes. Learn about the courses you can apply for after passing your 12th grade in the Commerce stream, their eligibility requirements, and the universities that offer them. Some of the programs below require candidates to have a background in mathematics, while others welcome individuals with any educational experience. We’ve also included the eligibility requirements for each course below for your convenience.

Professional Courses:

Here are the professional courses you can take after 12th Commerce, out of all the ones indicated in the table above:

  • BA LLB
  • B.Com
  • C.S. (Company Secretary)
  • Business Administration Bachelor’s Degree (BBA)
  • Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA)
  • Bachelors in Banking and Insurance (BBI)
  • Bachelor of Financial Markets (BFM)
  • C.S. (Company Secretary)
  • Bachelor’s degrees in banking and insurance are available (BBI)

Courses that Do Not Require Math

Don’t want to watch yourself battling with numerical and mathematical problems any longer? We’ve got you taken care of. Following is a list of courses that you can take after 12th Commerce without having to take math:

  • LLB + BA
  • Bachelor’s degree in fine arts (BFA)
  • BJMC (Bachelor of Journalism and Mass Communication)
  • BAMC (Bachelor of Arts and Mass Communication)
  • BA (Hons.) English\sDiploma Courses in Languages
  •  BA Courses
  • ANM

Top colleges for commerce:

Here are the top 5 colleges for commerce in India:

  • Shri Ram College of Commerce
  • Hindu College
  • Lady shri ram college for women
  • Loyola College
  • Christ University
